explains: v. 崩溃；塌陷（collapse 的 ing 形式）；折叠；压扁
wordGroup: collapsing strength 抗挤强度；破坏强度

sentences.en: The town's old quayside is collapsing after years of neglect.
sentences.cn: 这座小镇的旧码头区在多年疏于保养后快要坍塌了。

sentences.en: Rescuers used props to stop the roof of the tunnel collapsing.
sentences.cn: 救援人员用支柱防止隧道顶塌陷。

sentences.en: The building is in danger of collapsing.
sentences.cn: 这栋建筑有垮塌的危险。
